channel.title: CVE Feed for F5 Networks, Inc. -- BIG-IP LTM, AAM, AFM, Analytics, APM, ASM, DNS, Edge Gateway, GTM, Link Controller, PEM, WebAccelerator, WebSafe
channel.description: The latest CVEs for F5 Networks, Inc. -- BIG-IP LTM, AAM, AFM, Analytics, APM, ASM, DNS, Edge Gateway, GTM, Link Controller, PEM, WebAccelerator, WebSafe

item.title: CVE-2017-6151|2024-08-05T15:18:49.989Z -- f5%20networks%2C%20inc. -- big-ip%20ltm%2C%20aam%2C%20afm%2C%20analytics%2C%20apm%2C%20asm%2C%20dns%2C%20edge%20gateway%2C%20gtm%2C%20link%20controller%2C%20pem%2C%20webaccelerator%2C%20websafe
item.description: In F5 BIG-IP LTM, AAM, AFM, Analytics, APM, ASM, DNS, Edge Gateway, GTM, Link Controller, PEM, WebAccelerator and WebSafe software version 13.0.0, undisclosed requests made to BIG-IP virtual servers which make use of the "HTTP/2 profile" may result in a disruption of service to TMM.

item.title: CVE-2018-5500|2024-08-05T05:40:50.505Z -- f5%20networks%2C%20inc. -- big-ip%20ltm%2C%20aam%2C%20afm%2C%20analytics%2C%20apm%2C%20asm%2C%20dns%2C%20edge%20gateway%2C%20gtm%2C%20link%20controller%2C%20pem%2C%20webaccelerator%2C%20websafe
item.description: On F5 BIG-IP systems running 13.0.0, 12.1.0 - 12.1.3.1, or 11.6.1 - 11.6.2, every Multipath TCP (MCTCP) connection established leaks a small amount of memory. Virtual server using TCP profile with Multipath TCP (MCTCP) feature enabled will be affected by this issue.

item.title: CVE-2018-5501|2024-08-05T05:40:50.417Z -- f5%20networks%2C%20inc. -- big-ip%20ltm%2C%20aam%2C%20afm%2C%20analytics%2C%20apm%2C%20asm%2C%20dns%2C%20edge%20gateway%2C%20gtm%2C%20link%20controller%2C%20pem%2C%20webaccelerator%2C%20websafe
item.description: In some circumstances, on F5 BIG-IP systems running 13.0.0, 12.1.0 - 12.1.3.1, any 11.6.x or 11.5.x release, or 11.2.1, TCP DNS profile allows excessive buffering due to lack of flow control.

item.title: CVE-2017-6164|2024-08-05T15:18:49.659Z -- f5%20networks%2C%20inc. -- big-ip%20ltm%2C%20aam%2C%20afm%2C%20analytics%2C%20apm%2C%20asm%2C%20dns%2C%20edge%20gateway%2C%20gtm%2C%20link%20controller%2C%20pem%2C%20webaccelerator%2C%20websafe
item.description: In F5 BIG-IP LTM, AAM, AFM, Analytics, APM, ASM, DNS, Edge Gateway, GTM, Link Controller, PEM, WebAccelerator and WebSafe software version 13.0.0, 12.0.0 - 12.1.2, 11.6.0 - 11.6.1 and 11.5.0 - 11.5.4, in some circumstances, Traffic Management Microkernel (TMM) does not properly handle certain malformed TLS1.2 records, which allows remote attackers to cause a denial-of-service (DoS) or possible remote command execution on the BIG-IP system.
